5D72A43F.Line1.EDC75: Do you hear it? The howling? The hideous howling? I no longer know whether that horrific sound is in the air or in my head. My mind will not be still since I‘ve come to this place.

F7671DC1.Line3.EDC75: So many have disappeared, taken down into the earth by … something … never to be seen again. Is that the fate awaiting me? I am drawn to it, and have no will to resist.
